tool_description: Unified and secure way to use S3, Azure and Google Cloud Object Storage, with the additional security provided by sharding, scattering, per-slice encryption, and blockchain-inspired key/cipher management. To use this API you also need to sign-up (totally free) at https://rapidapi.extenua.com/register thank you.
name: Secure Object Storage (SOS)
title: Secure Object Storage (SOS)

api_list.name: GetBucketInfo
api_list.description: Retrieves general information on a bucket, authorizing via API-Key

required_parameters.name: bucket
required_parameters.description: bucket name

api_list.name: GetRecBinDirList
api_list.description: Retrieves the list of objects in the bucket's recycle bin, authorizing via API-Key

required_parameters.name: maxmd
required_parameters.description: maximum modification date, in the format 2006-01-02T15:04:05

required_parameters.name: sf
required_parameters.description: sort filter: 'name'||'objType'||'createdBy'||'creationDate'||'fileDate'||'objSize'

required_parameters.name: f
required_parameters.description: name of field for regex query: 'name'||'objType'||'createdBy'||'creationDate'||'fileDate'||'objSize'

required_parameters.name: fo
required_parameters.description: if f is present, fo contains the regex to be matched

required_parameters.name: bucket
required_parameters.description: bucket name

required_parameters.name: maxcd
required_parameters.description: maximum creation date, in the format 2006-01-02T15:04:05

required_parameters.name: minmd
required_parameters.description: minimum modification date, in the format 2006-01-02T15:04:05

required_parameters.name: sa
required_parameters.description: to be used together with sf, 'true' if sort ascending, 'false' if sort descending

required_parameters.name: mincd
required_parameters.description: minimum creation date, in the format 2006-01-02T15:04:05

api_list.name: GetDirList
api_list.description: Retrieves the list of a directory inside a bucket, authorizing via API-Key

required_parameters.name: objPath
required_parameters.description: full directory path

required_parameters.name: sf
required_parameters.description: sort filter: 'name'||'objType'||'createdBy'||'creationDate'||'fileDate'||'objSize'

required_parameters.name: fo
required_parameters.description: if f is present, fo contains the regex to be matched

required_parameters.name: f
required_parameters.description: name of field for regex query: 'name'||'objType'||'createdBy'||'creationDate'||'fileDate'||'objSize'

required_parameters.name: maxmd
required_parameters.description: maximum modification date, in the format 2006-01-02T15:04:05

required_parameters.name: mincd
required_parameters.description: minimum creation date, in the format 2006-01-02T15:04:05

required_parameters.name: bucket
required_parameters.description: bucket name

required_parameters.name: minmd
required_parameters.description: minimum modification date, in the format 2006-01-02T15:04:05

required_parameters.name: sa
required_parameters.description: to be used together with sf, 'true' if sort ascending, 'false' if sort descending

required_parameters.name: maxcd
required_parameters.description: maximum creation date, in the format 2006-01-02T15:04:05

api_list.name: GetObjectInfo
api_list.description: Retrieves object Information/Metadata, authorizing via API-Key

required_parameters.name: bucket
required_parameters.description: bucket name

required_parameters.name: objPath
required_parameters.description: full object path

api_list.name: DownloadFile
api_list.description: Reassembles, decrypts, and downloads a file from a bucket, authorizing via API-Key

required_parameters.name: bucket
required_parameters.description: bucket name

required_parameters.name: objPath
required_parameters.description: full object path
